questions.question_text: "collaboration" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Working together with others toward a shared goal
Managing budget details independently
Reporting performance issues to a supervisor
Completing tasks without any assistance
questions.example_sentence: The study noted that fully remote employees sometimes experience reduced collaboration efficiency.
questions.explanation:
協力・共同作業
予算管理
問題報告
単独作業

questions.question_text: "consistency" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The quality of behaving or performing in a similar way over time
The ability to switch tasks quickly
A temporary drop in productivity
A sudden change in organizational structure
questions.example_sentence: Employees with consistent work schedules tend to maintain higher productivity.
questions.explanation:
一貫性
素早い作業切り替え
一時的な低下
組織変更

questions.question_text: "strategy" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A plan designed to achieve long-term goals
A casual suggestion with no clear purpose
A mandatory company rule
A tool used to monitor employee attendance
questions.example_sentence: Companies are encouraged to review their communication strategies before expanding remote work.
questions.explanation:
戦略・方針
曖昧な提案
必須ルール
勤怠ツール

questions.question_text: "alignment" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The state of being in agreement or proper coordination
A conflict over differing goals
A sudden shift in work assignments
A period of low communication
questions.example_sentence: Structured communication windows improved alignment among distributed teams.
questions.explanation:
調整・一致
対立
割り当て変更
低コミュニケーション期間

questions.question_text: "implementation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The act of putting a plan or system into action
The cancellation of a project
The evaluation of employee performance
The distribution of office equipment
questions.example_sentence: The implementation of standardized reporting formats increased team coordination.
questions.explanation:
実施・導入
計画中止
業績評価
備品配布
